text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea collina (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Red Balau) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Malaysia and Singapore.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea collina". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31433A9634401. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31433A9634401.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
